22331.name: Figma Tokens Inspector
22331.description:
Allows to inspect design tokens set by Figma Tokens Plugin without risk of accidental breaking tokens.


Works even on components from Design Librariers!

22381.name: Select The Same Instance
22381.description:
Allows you to select only instances with a specific variant from within a selection such as a group or frame. This can be used, for example, to select only those buttons in the selection that have a Size of Big and a Shape of Round.


How To Use

  1. Select the group or frame that contains the instance you want to select.
  2. Activate this plug-in.
  3. Choose the Component Set name.
  4. Select all the values of the variant you want to select.
  5. Press the Select button.


Is it difficult to understand? Please refer to the video.

https://cloud.nju33.com/6LKZbultMemOiNSamKev

22102.name: rename layers 重命名图层
22102.description:
rename selected layers. note：if new name is empty,only text layers will be rename from characters


重命名图层，注意：如果输入框的内容为空，那么将自动识别文本图层的内容并以此来命名文本图层(非文本图层则跳过)

21293.name: @sposhe/reorder
21293.description:
Reorder a frame's children by their X or Y position (from right to left, top to bottom, etc).


To use:


  1. Select one or more frames with child nodes.
  2. Run the plugin
  3. Select a direction and press "Reorder"

22285.name: Localazy Plugin
22285.description:
What's Localazy?

Localazy is a continuous localization platform and web-based translation management system (TMS) that strives to make the usually awful software localization and translation experience efficient and enjoyable for individuals and product teams of any size.


Why Figma and Localazy?

So you can start localizing your designs in Figma right away! 


Localazy Figma Plugin allows you to upload all the text content from a Figma file to Localazy, translate the content into as many languages as you want, and then download translated content back to Figma to create localized designs quickly.


All the texts uploaded to Localazy are also immediately ready to be transferred into your mobile/web projects or other types of client UIs for a streamlined multilingual development experience.


Common issues with designs

Here’s a list of problems that might surprise you unprepared during the design process.

  • Bi-directionality (LTR/RTL) of languages
  • Distribution of word lengths in various languages
  • Copying strings from design to code (time-consuming duplications)
  • Continuous design localization problem & keeping track of updates
  • and more…


Figma Plugin by Localazy helps to resolve these problems with ease.


How do I start?

  1. In your project, go to the Plugins and select Localazy
  2. Connect your existing project on Localazy (if you don't have an account make you register and create one first)
  3. Go back to Figma and upload your texts


Documentation:

https://localazy.com/docs/figma


NOTE: To use Localazy Figma Plugin, you need to activate the Localazy Autopilot Plan subscription or higher.

22876.name: Theme Composer - Figma Website Builder
22876.description:
Theme Composer is a Figma plugin that allows you to create a complete website with Figma + HTML5 and CSS without writing a single line of code.


UI Library

From hero sections and contact forms - we've created 150 Elements that you can use to build a website straight away. 

  • 150 Ui Elements
  • 50 Landing Pages
  • Figma Auto layout
  • Color and Text Styles


HTML Previewer

Convert every User Interface in the UI Library to HTML easily.

  • HTML 5 + CSS 3
  • Bootstrap 5
  • SASS Included
  • Fully Responsive


Home Page: Theme Composer

21710.name: cronos
21710.description: With this plugin you can measure time, the design still looks terrible, I know, but i'll work on that
21710.release_notes: Centralized time, I'll do more design later

21734.name: A Replacer
21734.description:
You can replace the layer with a custom element, and the replaced layer will inherit the size attribute.


你可以用自定义的元素替图层，被替换的图层会继承尺寸属性。


使用方式：

选择一个元素，然后将其添加到“替换源”列表

选择需要被替换的元素，然后点击“替换源”列表中的元素。

可以在“替换源”列表中预先添加多个需要的替换元素

每个文档的“替换源”都是私有的


你可以通过将组件添加到“替换源”来将其他元素替换为该组件的实例，如果需要添加团队组件，请将组件的实例添加到文档后将该实例添加为“替换源”


Usage:


Select an element and add it to the replace source list


Select the element to be replaced, and then click the element in the "replacement source" list.


You can add multiple required replacement elements in the replacement source list in advance


The "replacement source" of each document is private


You can replace other elements with instances of the component by adding the component to the "replacement source". If you need to add a team component, please add the instance of the component to the document and add the instance as the "replacement source"

22864.name: Figma2xaml
22864.description: This plugin can help you convert simple vector paths to xaml (eXtensible Application Markup Language). Don't forget to simplify all the elements into vector paths using the commands "Flatten" and "Outline Stroke".

22568.name: Compress Frames
22568.description:
Export compressed frames from Figma


Compress icon by icons8

22207.name: Caption Sweeper
22207.description:
Nothing special. Just removing the clutter.


Frame 237438291

Frame 237438292

↓

Run Caption Sweeper

↓

Frame

Frame


Works with frames, groups, rectangles, vectors, lines, ellipses.

22913.name: Copy names for Json
22913.description: One click copy file names, and you can choose the suffix!

22824.name: Knob Creator
22824.description:
Welcome to Figma Knob Creator


Knob Creator is a Figma plugin to create knob stack images. These can be used for creating themes for digital audio workstations, VST plugins and more. The aim of this plugin is to make this as easy as possible.


Go to the Howto Page page for an explanation on how to use this plugin.


Contribute


If you would like to contribute, you can do it by:


  • Fork the repo, add your code and create a PR
  • Buy me a coffee


Issues


Did you run into issues, or have any feature requests? Add them here.

22946.name: Bookmark - Files Organiser
22946.description:
Keep all your files and links organised right inside Figma with Bookmark.


You can create folders and add files with links to keep your projects organised. Bookmark lets you export and import your organised data using json format.


Happy Bookmarking ✌️

22802.name: Vivid Gradient: beautify your gradient
22802.description:
Worried about your gradient not looking good? That’s because there are gray dead zone in the middle of your gradient.


Don’t worry! Just a click, it will magically beautify your gradient.


Vivid Gradient is so amazing! Have a try and you will love it!


Any questions or suggestions, contact me: nowork.app@gmail.com

22872.name: Supersearch
22872.description: Search any page or node by name and click to navigate to it quickly.

22846.name: Random Text Generator
22846.description:
A lean plugin that generates randomized text and numbers for multiple layers as effortlessly as possible.

This plugin was created with productivity in mind, allowing you to create randomized data for prototypes with just a few keystrokes.

How to use it

  1. Run the Random Text Generator plugin
  2. Select the text layers
  3. Write the text you want to use, wrapping the randomized data in as described.
  4. Choose between Replace text (default) or attach to the beginning or end of the selected text layers.
  5. Press return or click the Change text button. Voilà!

Example uses

  1. Currency amounts → $[100-999].[10-99]
  2. Last online → Last online [1-9][d;hr;m] ago
  3. Phone numbers → +1 (800) [100-999]-[1000-9999]
  4. Status → [Online;Offline;Away;Do not disturb]
  5. Adding emails to a list of names using Append after → @[gmail;hotmail;yahoo;company].com

What's coming next

  • Find and replace within the selected layers.
  • Allow faster execution of the plugin, using Parameters through Figma Quick Actions menu: ⌘ /

Support or feature requests

Feel free to reach out on Twitter at twitter.com/uxjavi
